definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: When people sleep on their front, their lower jaw is positioned further forward than normal.
sentences.chinese: 因爲當人們俯臥的時候，下顎會比平時更加突出。

sentences.english: His face was squarish with a high forehead heavy jaw and broad nose.
sentences.chinese: 他一章方臉上嵌着高額頭，粗大的下顎和蒜頭鼻。

sentences.english: Don't tuck the napkin in your vest or put it under chin like a baby's bib.
sentences.chinese: 不要把餐巾塞入馬甲或圍在下顎像嬰兒的圍兜。

sentences.english: "To this day I have no sensation in my lower lip and chin, " says the architect from Germantown, Md.
sentences.chinese: 直到現在，我對自己的下顎都一點感覺也沒有。

sentences.english: Undershot or overshot bite is a disqualification.
sentences.chinese: 上顎或下顎突出爲失格。

sentences.english: His face was squarish, with a high forehead, heavy jaw, and broad nose.
sentences.chinese: 他一張方臉上嵌着高額頭，粗大的下顎和蒜頭鼻。

sentences.english: A pair of upper and lower jaw have sharp incisors.
sentences.chinese: 上下顎各有一對銳利的門齒。

sentences.english: Bigger's teeth clamped so tight that his jaws ached.
sentences.chinese: 別格的牙關咬得那麼緊，連上下顎都疼了。

sentences.english: Human molars and jaws responded to the invention of cooking by getting smaller.
sentences.chinese: 人類的牙齒及下顎由於烹飪的發明而變得越來越小。

sentences.english: He then moved from my mouth down my jaw to my neck.
sentences.chinese: 他吻着我的下顎，滑向我的頸間。

sentences.english: In addition, the interdental space over the anterior region of the mandibular arch was closed.
sentences.chinese: 下顎則關閉因牙齒融合而產生的間隙。

sentences.english: Release your jaw further and massage deeper with each exhale.
sentences.chinese: 呼氣時進一步放鬆下顎骨並按摩。

sentences.english: Jensen has a reconstructed jaw and much of his face is damaged.
sentences.chinese: 詹森臉部多處損傷，他的下顎是再造的。

sentences.english: The researchers believe that the mosquito uses the maxillary palp for long range detection of prey.
sentences.chinese: 這組科學家相信蚊子使用下顎須探測遠距離的獵物。

sentences.english: Keep your mouth slightly open which unlocks the tension in your jaw and neck.
sentences.chinese: 讓您的嘴巴略微張放這放鬆了你緊張的下顎和頸部。

sentences.english: My morning coat, my collar mounting firmly to the chin.
sentences.chinese: 我晨間的大衣，衣領穩穩地攀至下顎。

definition: temple (on the sides of human head)
to stick up/to point sth up
cervical vertebra/the seven cervical vertebrae in the neck of humans and most mammals
to release/to let go/to loosen/to untie/to come loose
